title: Share of people owning microwave ovens in Germany 2008 to 2017
summary: In general Share of respondents has fallen over the Year.
Share of respondents is slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2013 and 2015.
The highest Share of respondents, of value 80.0 was reached at Year 2010
The lowest Share of respondents, of value 65.0 was reported at Year 2017
min_summary: Overall Share of respondents has decreased over the Year.
Share of respondents is slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2017.
